Treasury Wine

Treasury Wine

  • Adobe XD
  • UI
  • Atomic Design
  • International

TWE is an umbrella brand consisting of around 50 wineries around the globe, including Wolf Blass and Blossom Hill. Each of the US brands needed redesigning in a very tight timescale. Working with teams in Australia and the US an ultra-efficient atomic styleguide was produced for each brand, allowing for 12 site launches in as many weeks.

Retail Analytics

Retail Analytics

  • Big Data
  • QA
  • Git
  • Data Visualisation
  • JS

Tradestate is an in-house analytics dashboard providing data such as Store Status, Average Order Value and Conversion Rates.Working with developers, project managers and tech leads, I assisted the design and development of new dashboard widgets - using d3,js to visualise information in a considered, easy to digest and engaging way.

Magento Design System

Magento Design System

  • Sketch
  • Training
  • Atomic Design
  • DSM
  • UI

In order to streamline the design process for Magento projects, a hyper efficient, flexible and automatable design system was created in Sketch and InVision’s Design System Manager. Working very closely with developers, this approach could potentially reducing the design time required for a simple Magento project project in half.

PDF Builder

PDF Builder

  • WordPress
  • Training
  • Consulting
  • JS
  • PHP
  • Management

DJA wanted a custom Wordpress integration for their new site - allowing users to create and download PDF’s of select projects they had case studies for. Elements are stored in the browser using IndexedDB. Upon download, that stored data is retrieved from local browser storage and populated into a custom PDF template using pdfMake.js.

Content Assets

Content Assets

  • HTML
  • SASS
  • Gulp
  • JS
  • Documentation
  • Training

Content assets are the images, text and videos you see in Salesforce sites, and are typically managed by non-technical people. As such, they must be easy to populate, amend and customise. I created and demonstrated easy to use content assets to a wide range of clients - eliminating the need for developers when it comes to swapping out static content.
